segments.text: I'm watching this kitchen scene unfold before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s an indoor setting, with a simple, almost line-drawn quality to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My attention is immediately drawn to the sink on the right wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is fully on, and water is just gushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s completely overflowing the single basin, pouring down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a significant puddle forming on the floor, growing wider by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there, drying a plate, seems utterly oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, yet her expression remains perfectly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite unsettling to see her so completely unaware of the rising water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The waste of water is rather unfortunate, considering the potential damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope she notices it before the whole kitchen is flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks so peaceful, a stark contrast to this impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost surreal, this quiet disaster unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
